findings.title: Checkout email field is missing a visible and programmatic label
findings.impact: Screen reader users cannot reliably identify the field purpose.
reproduction: Navigate to email field with keyboard
Inspect field announcement in screen reader
findings.actual: The input relies on placeholder text and has no associated label.
findings.expected: A visible label and programmatic association should exist.
findings.recommended_fix: Add a <label for="checkout-email">Email</label> and keep placeholder optional.

findings.title: Primary modal traps visual focus but not keyboard focus
findings.impact: Keyboard users can tab to background content and lose modal context.
findings.actual: Tab moves to links behind the modal.
findings.expected: Focus remains trapped within modal until close.
findings.recommended_fix: Implement focus trap, set initial focus on open, restore focus to trigger on close.
